firstNightReminder: The City guard chooses 2 players, show whether any of them is an outsider.
otherNightReminder: The City guard chooses 2 players, show whether any of them is an outsider.
name: City guard
ability: Each night, choose 2 players (not yourself): learn if any of them is an outsider.

firstNightReminder: Show thumbs down or thumbs up.
otherNightReminder: Show thumbs down or thumbs up.
name: Celebrity
ability: Players who choose you with their ability at night learn your character.

firstNightReminder: The Houndmaster chooses a player, show thumbs down or thumbs up.
otherNightReminder: The Houndmaster chooses a player, show thumbs down or thumbs up.
name: Houndmaster
ability: Each night*, choose a player: learn if any of their townsfolk neighbour is dead.

otherNightReminder: The Graverobber may choose a player.
name: Jezus Christ
ability: The first good player to die at night does not. Evil wins on 3rd dawn.

otherNightReminder: Show 2 character tokens.
name: Conspirator
ability: Each night, choose a player. Learn how many times they were chosen by other players at night.

otherNightReminder: If the Angler has chosen a player during the day and 3 or more players are dead, they both may die.
name: Angler
ability: Each day, publicly choose a player (different to last day): tonight, none of you can die, if 3 or more players are dead, one of you dies instead.

name: Archangel
ability: Minions are good and don't know who the demon is.

name: Pastor
ability: If a townsfolk was executed today, no townsfolk can die tonight.

otherNightReminder: If the Falconer died tonight, show thumbs up or thumbs down.
name: Falconer
ability: If you die at night, choose a player: learn if they or any of their neighbours are a demon.

otherNightReminder: The Surgeon may choose a player.
name: Surgeon
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: if they are a townsfolk, they die. Otherwise, they are resurrected.

name: Girlfriend
ability: You start knowing a good player. That player is drunk while you are alive.

otherNightReminder: Servant chooses 3 alive players and may become the evil demon.
name: Servant
ability: When the demon dies, you become the evil demon. Each night*, choose 3 alive players, the demon may only kill them.

otherNightReminder: The Organ donor may die and the other player may be resurrected.
name: Organ donor
ability: Each day, you may publicly ask another player what their character is. If they lie, you die tonight and they are resurrected.

otherNightReminder: The homeless may die.
name: Homeless
ability: Each night*, one of your good neighbours die. Each day, if one alive player agrees, you are both drunk until dusk.

otherNightReminder: Voayer might choose a player. They choose whether the Voayer dies.
name: Voayer
ability: Some nights, choose a player which you have not chosen yet (not yourself): they choose whether you die.

otherNightReminder: The Acolyte may choose an alive player.
name: Acolyte
ability: If you die, choose an alive player. They become a demon.

otherNightReminder: The Monster may be resurrected.
name: Monster
ability: Each night*, you may die, be poisoned or be resurrected.

otherNightReminder: Judas may choose a player.
name: Judas
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a non-demon character you become. If the character was in the game, they die and become a Judas.

otherNightReminder: A demon is resurrected if this is the first time a demon died.
name: krampus
ability: Each night*, choose a good alive player: They die and if they were alive, might be resurrected next night.

otherNightReminder: The Cockroach might learn who the evil demons are.
name: The Cockroach
ability: You think you are an outsider, but you are not. When you die, you are woken to learn who the evil demons are. [+1 outsider]

otherNightReminder: Basilisk chooses a player.
name: Basilisk
ability: Each night*, choose a good player (not yourself): They learn who you are. When you die, all players that learned who you are die.

otherNightReminder: Each good player chooses whether a neighbour dies.
name: One King
ability: Each good player may kill one of their alive neighbours each night*. If no one does, evil wins. Only 1 evil player can die at night. [+2 kings, -2 minions].

otherNightReminder: Ghuul chooses a player.
name: Ghuul
ability: Each night*, you are resurrected. Each night*, choose a player: they die. Evil loses if & only if all minions are dead. [+1 minion]

otherNightReminder: Saint nicholas chooses a player.
name: Saint Nicholas
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If a player was mad about being a minion, the Archangel dies at night. [+Krampus, +Archangel]

otherNightReminder: Chernobog chooses a player.
name: Chernobog
ability: You start knowing a good player. When you die, they become a Chernobog. Each night*, choose one of their alive neighbours: they die.
